decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Supporting Info and appendices, Appendix 9, Unnumbered Site Location Plan, 2197-01, Unnumbered Existing Block Plan Received: 29 February 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The use hereby permitted for D1 (Medical) purposes shall not be carried on outside the following times; Monday to Friday 08:30-17:30, Saturdays 09:00-17:30 and none shall take place on Sundays or Bank Holidays.

Condition : 4 - The premises shall be used for D1 (Medical) and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class D of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 2015 (as amended), or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).
description: Change of use from office (B1) to medical (D1)
